fields.name: Part 1:

title: Table of Contents
description: Welcome to LucidVR! If you're new, and want to start building, it's strongly recommended to watch the [official tutorial](https://discord.com/channels/784543299045818420/922568146957774878/922573502744260648), as it goes over most aspects of the build process. If you have a more specific question, many of the most frequently asked questions can be found below:
